text: Helsingborgs IF had a successful season with the return of prodigal son Henrik Larsson from Barcelona putting the club into international spotlight. Following a dire start to the season, coach Peter Swärdh was sacked and replaced by Stuart Baxter, the Englishman's first Swedish job for five years. A strong end to the season saw Helsingborg briefly go into title contention, but that was not to be. Instead, Helsingborg beat Gefle 2-0 in the cup final, qualifying for the UEFA Cup as an effect. ==Squad== ===Goalkeepers=== * Daniel Andersson * Oscar Berglund * Pär Hansson ===Defenders=== * Tony
